SELECT MIMS.COMPANY_CD , MIMS.DIVISION_CD , MIMS.ITEM_ID , MIN(MI.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MIN(MI.ITEM_SPEC) AS ITEM_SPEC , MIN(MI.ITEM_TYPE) AS ITEM_TYPE , MIN((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL)) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MIMS.UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MIMS.COMPANY_CD, MIMS.DIVISION_CD, MIMS.UOM) FROM DUAL) AS UOM_NM , SUM(END_QTY) AS QTY , MIN(MIVUP.UNIT_PRICE) AS UNIT_PRICE , SUM(END_QTY * MIVUP.UNIT_PRICE) AS AMOUNT , MIMS.ITEM_ID || '_' || MIMS.UOM AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_ITEM_INOUT_MONTHLY_SUMMARY MIMS , MOM_ITEM_VALUATION_UNIT_PRICE MIVUP , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_WAREHOUSE MWH WHERE MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MIVUP.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MIVUP.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.ITEM_ID = MIVUP.ITEM_ID AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = MWH.COMPANY_CD AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = MWH.DIVISION_CD AND MIMS.WAREHOUSE_CD = MWH.WAREHOUSE_CD AND MIMS.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIMS.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MIVUP.CURRENCY_CD = 'KRW' AND TO_DATE(#{basicDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN MIVUP.START_DATE AND MIVUP.END_DATE
AND (UPPER(MI.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MI.ITEM_TYPE IN (${itemType})
GROUP BY MIMS.COMPANY_CD , MIMS.DIVISION_CD , MIMS.ITEM_ID , MIMS.UOM
